name: Guaranteed Ride Home
description: Free emergency rides home for commuters using transit, carpool, bike, or walk
fullDescription: County-based programs that provide free or reimbursed emergency rides home for commuters who use alternative transportation (transit, carpool, vanpool, biking, or walking) to get to work.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free or reimbursed rides home during emergencies
- Covers illness, family emergencies, unscheduled overtime
- Available via taxi, Uber/Lyft, or rental car
- Typically 2-4 free rides per year
- Separate programs in each Bay Area county
howToGetIt:
1. Must commute using alternative transportation (not driving alone)
2. Register with your county's program (free)
3. When emergency arises, use taxi or rideshare
4. Submit receipt for reimbursement
5. Contact your county program for specific requirements
keywords: Guaranteed Ride Home, emergency ride, 511, free taxi, Uber, Lyft, commuter, transit, carpool, bike
